## Hint 1

The only parts you need to change is the `aes()` aesthetics, and `ggtitle()`
:::
::::

::: {.callout-tip title="Show answer" collapse="true"}
```{r}
# Libraries
library(ggplot2) # load ggplot2 libray 

# Create a Data Frame
Data_Frame <- data.frame (
  Training = c("Strength", "Stamina", "Other"),
  Pulse = c(100, 150, 120),
  Duration = c(60, 30, 45)
)

# Create a boxplot
ggplot(Data_Frame, aes(y = Duration)) +
  # add a colour argument
  geom_boxplot(fill = "lightgreen") + 
  #add a title 
  ggtitle("Duration boxplot") + 
  # Move title to the center
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + 
  # Remove the gray background panel 
  theme(panel.background = element_blank()) # remove background
```
:::
